Ice Pebble Staff

two handed weapon (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 66
resist cold [coldres]: +5
spell [itemspell]: #624 Numbness
weap id [weapon]: 238 (Magic Staff)
damage [dmg]: 3
attack [att]: +2
defence [def]: +4

nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Requires Two Hands [twohanded], Bludgeoning Damage [blunt], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 15W to forge (W3)

This strange staff is adorned with pebbles of ice. The owner of the staff is partially protected from frost and can release the cold of the staff at his enemies, making them numb and frozen.
